articles.title: Astronomers Spot Two Unusually Red Objects in the Asteroid Belt
articles.description: They’re red, they’re reasonably big, and they have no business being in the main asteroid belt, but their discovery confirms the complex conditions in place when the solar system was still forming. Read more...
